participant_1.name: Alex Hunter
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to socialize but has a fear of heights.
participant_1.background: i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Tom Reynolds
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, enjoys outdoor activities and has a keen interest in leisure activities.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i've been retired for a years.
